Heading 1 – Off White 32px

Heading 2 – White 20px

Heading 3 – Medium 12px

Heading 4 – Light (Not Set) 20px

Heading 5 – Light (Not Set) 16px
Heading 6 – Light (Not Set) 14px

Paragraph – Light (Default) 16px

Small text – Light (Default) 12px Text link – Light (Default) 16px

Text Utility Classes

These utility classes can be applied to any text element, not just headlines.

Danger/Negative CTA

Info/Neutral CTA

Tertiary Text

Lowercase Text

Uppercase Text

All headings have 20px bottom margin.
